UniprotID	Q969U7-2
Accession	Q969U7;B0YJB3;Q6IAH4;Q9NRV1;V9GYH7
EntryName	PSMG2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Proteasome assembly chaperone 2 (PAC-2) (Hepatocellular carcinoma-susceptibility protein 3) (Tumor necrosis factor superfamily member 5-induced protein 1)
GeneName	PSMG2 HCCA3 PAC2 TNFSF5IP1
Length	233
Function	Chaperone protein which promotes assembly of the 20S proteasome as part of a heterodimer with PSMG1. The PSMG1-PSMG2 heterodimer binds to the PSMA5 and PSMA7 proteasome subunits, promotes assembly of the proteasome alpha subunits into the heteroheptameric alpha ring and prevents alpha ring dimerization.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar
